overview: Ana and Dora organize a “party” at the family's farm. Ana goes through a difficult phase after breaking up with her unfaithful boyfriend Dino, an actor who always returns from “rehearsals” at four in the morning and tries to clear his head at the time. Dora is an insatiable girl who likes lively parties. The guests arrive and the bacchanal begins, but without the participation of Ana, who is not as enthusiastic about collective sex as her friend and prefers to enjoy her cesspool in the quiet garden. Then, here's Mauro, an ex-priest who is Dora's cousin and who appears at the farm to rethink his own religious life at a time of vocational crisis.
title: Fêmeas que Topam Tudo
